Player History
Injured on 8/8/1965 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1967, off Jim O'Toole (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1967, off Jim Palmer (HOU)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1967, hitting .286 with 5 HR, 69 RBI...
Injured on 6/28/1969 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Injured on 6/19/1971 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/2/1972 to a 3-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
